thread.title: Standard Chartered, Credit Suisse Face Equity-Raising Dilemma
thread.title_full: Standard Chartered, Credit Suisse Face Equity-Raising Dilemma - WSJ

author: Max Colchester
title: Standard Chartered, Credit Suisse Face Equity-Raising Dilemma
text:
Two big European banks face a painful choice in the coming weeks: whether to tap shareholders for funds despite plummeting share prices.
Standard Chartered PLC and Credit Suisse Group AG are considering raising equity, according to analysts and people familiar with the matter. The moves come as regulators continue to pressure banks to shore up their balance sheets as European growth remains muted, commodity prices crash and Asia...
